title: Support native Docker daemon (dockerd)
body: It would be great to be able to run the Docker daemon (dockerd) natively in WSL.

comments.body: As of Sep 1, I've accomplished this without the Docker WSL2 Tech Preview.  I believe the WSL2 Tech Preview also runs docker natively.
This MAY come once WSL runs a full Linux kernel (4.19, IIRC)
